attributes.action: To stop Playboy logo being marketed to underage children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I saw a Playboy colouring book the other day for 3 year olds. This is terrible and for a government who tries to combat paedophilia surely this is way too far. I don't want porn, whether its just a logo or not marketed to underage children, its terrible.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
